typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	asa as string (Column_6)
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(Column_3 = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Aggregate1
